page.title: 09Boy Scouts in Kensworth Area
page.content: Boys aged 8 to 10years in this area attend either Kensworth or Studham Cub Packs.Both Packs meet on Wednesdays 6.30-7.45pm.Kensworth at the Methodist Chapel Hall,Studham in the Studham,Kensworth & Markyate Scout Group Headquarters at the Playing Field,Studham.At present Kensworth have 17 and Studham 21 invested members.Apart from their weekly meetings during term time both Packs take part in Dunstable District Cub Scout events,ie.Handicraft Exhibition, Cross Country Run,Sports,Job Week, Camp,Chess Competition,Cub Khana,St. George's Day and Remembrance Day Parades.The Packs also help in the community at local events:Studham May Fair,Methodist Chapel Bazaar,Whipsnade Church Fete as Pack Good Turns.Studham Pack also goes carol signing each year,the proceeds going to charity.
